mapper.select: SELECT resume_no , title , user_id , create_date , modify_date FROM tbl_resume WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY resume_no DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT j.user_id, j.job_post_no, jp.title, jp.end_date, c.company_id, c.company_name FROM tbl_jpl j inner JOIN tbl_job_post jp ON j.job_post_no = jp.job_post_no INNER JOIN tbl_company c ON jp.company_id = c.company_id WHERE user_id= #{userId} ORDER BY j.scrap_date DESC LIMIT 3;
